title: The News with Rick Sanchez - October 07, 2019 (20:00 ET)
text:
Breaking: Turkey invades Syria, Kurds doomed? (Full show)

The White House has been sending mixed signals about the Turkish attack on US-allied Kurdish fighters in Syria. Meanwhile, the Taliban is more powerful than at any time since the beginning of the US invasion of Afghanistan. RT America’s Rachel Blevins joins Rick Sanchez to explain. RT’s Yulia Shapovalova reports on China’s withdrawal from an Iranian oil deal worth billions. We also discuss the decline of journalistic standards on television, tool-use among pigs and the escalating violence in Hong Kong.
description:
Breaking: Turkey invades Syria, Kurds doomed? (Full show)
The White House has been sending mixed signals about the Turkish attack on US-allied Kurdish fighters in Syria
